headline: Esperion Therapeutics: Little Upside Potential In Their Earlier Generation Drug
summary: Esperion Therapeutics has two approved LDL-C lowering therapies, Nexletol and Nexlizet, but lacks a strong pipeline for future growth.

raw.headline: Esperion Therapeutics: Little Upside Potential In Their Earlier Generation Drug
